attributes.action: Change how the mayor of London is elected. Should be put to a national vote.
attributes.additional_details:
London is losing its heritage, it's nightlife, it's sparkle. It should be run by a patriot who loves England's value's and upholds it's legacy for generations to come.
Crime is a problem in the capital.
ULEZ should be scrapped as it is killing all businesses and making people poorer.
attributes.background: Put it to the people. Get a referendum done to decide if it should be a national vote that decides the Mayor of our capital city.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It is the responsibility of the Mayor of London and the London Assembly. 

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
